item.title: Automatically archiving argo workflow logs using kubectl
item.description: The project uses argo-workflow as the workflow engine to orchestrate and run some hyperconverged cluster deployment related tasks, and the whole environment runs on a single node K3s. The main reason for choosing argo-workflow + K3s is to consume as few system resources as possible, since this environment will run on various laptops with different hardware configurations in the future ðŸ˜‚. After researching some common K8s deployment tools, we finally chose K3s, which consumes less system resources.
